rArimaOption

ARIMA-Based Option Pricing R Package.

Project Status

  • Repository: https://github.com/JohnGavin/rArimaOption
  • Website: https://JohnGavin.github.io/rArimaOption (Pending Deployment)
  • CI/CD: Uses a reproducible Nix environment (via rix).

Overview

This package implements a financial modeling workflow: 1. Simulation: Simulate stock price paths under the physical measure (GBM, SVJD, Heston). 2. Risk Neutralization: Fit ARIMA models to extract risk premiums and transform paths to the risk-neutral measure. 3. Pricing: Price European options using the risk-neutral paths.

Installation

This project uses Nix for reproducibility.

# Enter the environment
nix-shell
# Start R
R

Usage 

library(rArimaOption)

# 1. Simulate Physical Paths
paths <- sim_gbm(n = 100, h = 1, S0 = 100, mu = 0.05, sigma = 0.2)

# 2. Risk Neutralization (Coming Soon)
# ...

# 3. Pricing (Coming Soon)
# ...
